Package users

Class Broker

java.lang.Object
users.Broker
public class Broker
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a broker.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<Pair<Auction,​Client>> auctionClientsPairs
    A list of pairs of clients that the broker is assigned to and their respective auctions.
    private Auction currentAuction
    The broker's currently ongoing auction.
    private int currentEarnings
    The broker's current total earnings, through the auction commissions.
    private int personalNumber
    The broker's unique personal number.

      public void removeProduct​(java.util.List<Product> products, java.util.Map<Product,​Client> soldProducts, Product sold, Client winner)
      Removes a product from an available list to a sold list.
      Parameters:
      products - The available products list.
      soldProducts - The sold products list.
      sold - The product to be sold.
      winner - The client that bought the product over an auction.

    • hasClient

      public boolean hasClient​(Client client)
      Checks if a certain client is assigned to this broker.
      Parameters:
      client - The client to be checked.
      Returns:
      A boolean value representing if the broker is assigned to the client or not.
